data.title: OBIT MCGAHA, CONSTANCE HELEN
data.text: McGAHA, Constance Helen, 55, of Catawba, died Friday, May 7, 1993, in a Salem hospital. She was retired from Tultex Corp. in Roanoke. She is survived by two daughters, Diane Allison of Check, LuAnne Mawby of Greenville, S. C.; a sister, Betty Soper of Maryland; three grandchildren. Funeral services will be held Monday, May 10, 1993, at noon at the Lotz Salem Chapel with the Rev. Jim Richards officiating. Interment will be in Westview Cemetery in Craig County. Friends may call at Lotz Salem Chapel after noon on Sunday. by CNB
